MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith. It has necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7:30pm to carryout a repair on the underground cable network at Larkfield Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:25pm on 30th October 2020.
